name: Comparative transcriptome analysis of rutabaga (Brassica napus) cultivars in response to Plasmodiophora brassicae
description: Expression data of rutabagas ('Laurentian' and 'Wilhemsburger') in response to Plasmodiophora brassicae pathotype 3A

citation.text: Zhou Q. 2020. Comparative transcriptome analysis of rutabaga (Brassica napus) cultivars in response to Plasmodiophora brassicae. M.Sc. thesis.

distribution.name: Expression changes and annotations of transcripts matched to Figure 3.9.tab
distribution.description: Expression changes and annotations of transcripts matched to Figure 3.9

distribution.name: Transcripts with significant expression changes.tab
distribution.description: Transcripts showing significant expression changes in at least one of six comparison sets of inoculated vs. non-inoculated samples
